// INSERT MENU
		$wpdb->query("INSERT INTO ".$wpdb->prefix."terms (name, slug) 
										VALUES ('Main Menu', 'main-menu')");		
		$new_menu_id = $wpdb->insert_id;				

		$wpdb->query("INSERT INTO ".$wpdb->prefix."term_taxonomy (term_id, taxonomy, count)
										VALUES (".$new_menu_id.", 'nav_menu', 106)");				
		$tti = $wpdb->insert_id;
		
			$prev_post_id = array();
		
			$post_info = array(
				"post_author" => 1, 
				"post_date" => '2016-08-16 13:31:41', 
				"post_date_gmt" => '2016-08-16 13:31:41', 
				"post_content" => '', 
				"post_title" => 'Home', 
				"post_excerpt" => '', 
				"post_status" => 'publish', 
				"comment_status" => 'closed', 
				"ping_status" => 'closed', 
				"post_password" => '', 
				"post_name" => 'home', 
				"to_ping" => '', 
				"pinged" => '', 
				"post_modified" => '2016-08-22 07:03:39',

				"post_content_filtered" => '', 
				"post_parent" => 0, 
				"menu_order" => 1, 
				"post_type" => 'nav_menu_item', 	
				"post_mime_type" => '', 
				"comment_count" => 0
			);

				"%s", 
				"%s",

				"%s",

				"%d", 
				"%s", 	
				"%s", 
				"%d"
			);			
			$wpdb->insert($wpdb->prefix."posts", $post_info, $post_info_types);
						
			$new_post_id = $wpdb->insert_id;
			
			$prev_post_id[608] = $new_post_id;
			$wpdb->query("UPDATE ".$wpdb->prefix."posts SET
											guid = '".str_replace("?p=608", "?p=".$new_post_id, "#wpurl#/?p=608")."'
												WHERE ID = ".$new_post_id);
			
						$wpdb->query("INSERT INTO ".$wpdb->prefix."postmeta 
												(post_id, meta_key, meta_value)
												 VALUES 
												 (".$new_post_id.", '_vc_post_settings', 'a:1:{s:10:\"vc_grid_id\";a:0:{}}')");	
												 
						
						
						$wpdb->query("INSERT INTO ".$wpdb->prefix."postmeta 
												(post_id, meta_key, meta_value)
												 VALUES 
												 (".$new_post_id.", '_menu_item_type', 'custom')");	
												 
						
						
						$wpdb->query("INSERT INTO ".$wpdb->prefix."postmeta 
												(post_id, meta_key, meta_value)
												 VALUES 
												 (".$new_post_id.", '_menu_item_menu_item_parent', '0')");

												(post_id, meta_key, meta_value)

												 (".$new_post_id.", '_menu_item_object_id', '608')");
